creator: Com2uS Holdings Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Easy Peasy Monster Squishy! Hack and slash like there's no tomorrow!
Soul Strike - Idle RPG, the perfect action idle game that you have been looking for is now live!
Slay and strike vampires, titans, zombies, slimes, and dragons to continue your legendary adventure!
Click and tap to battle your way to be the number 1 legend of this fantasy war!

Game Features
● Spam your skills on endless waves of enemies!
Enjoy exciting action-packed roguelike battles as you wipe out hundreds of monsters at once!
Clear and harvest thousands of stages by defeating monsters with fancy skills and actions!

● Customize your hero endlessly with 999 Parts!
Beefing up stats isn't the only way to make your beloved character stand out!
You can come up with a trillion combinations to make your character unique!

● Guaranteed offline growth boost with AFK idle rewards!
Enjoy super-fast growth that transcends the speed of time in this fun idle action game!
Indulge in the temptation of idle progression online as you watch your character become endlessly stronger!

● Enjoy the fun of idle RPG-style item farming anytime, anywhere!
An immortal being's desire knows no bounds!
Satisfy your immortal greed by obtaining Parts through hack n slash hunting or crafting!
Keep slaying monsters until you find the legendary option you want on the piece of Parts you desire!

● Craft your unique Soul Parts at the special place, Shelter!
Craft infinitely at the Shelter to get the finest Parts!
You can also cook food and craft cool outfits as well!

Step into a free online idle RPG game and experience stress-free gameplay.
Discover why Soul Strike stands out as a top roguelike idle action RPG game in today's gaming landscape.

* Soul Strike Official Site

Slay and strike vampires, titans, zombies, slimes, and dragons to continue your legendary adventure!
Click and tap to battle your way to be the number 1 legend of this fantasy war!

● Spam your skills on endless waves of enemies!
Enjoy exciting action-packed roguelike battles as you wipe out hundreds of monsters at once!
Clear and harvest thousands of stages by defeating monsters with fancy skills and actions!

Step into a free online idle RPG game and experience stress-free gameplay.
